software.name: Minimap2
software.description: Minimap2 is a versatile mapper and pairwise aligner for nucleotide sequences.

software.name: StringTie2
software.description: StringTie is a fast and highly efficient assembler of RNA-Seq alignments into potential transcripts.
software.config: StringTie used default parameters for long reads (-L)

software.name: IsoQuant
software.description: IsoQuant is a tool for reference-based analysis of long RNA reads.
software.config: IsoQuant used default parameters for PacBio reads (-d pacbio_ccs --read_group file_name)

software.name: gffread
software.description: GFF/GTF utility providing format conversions, filtering, FASTA sequence extraction and more.
software.config: gffread was used to GTF to FASTA convertion with -g <reference.fasta> -w options
